snippet.title: My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic - Math Game for Kids | LeapFrog
snippet.description:
Join your My Little Pony friends for high-flying adventures while putting a stop to Discord's latest tricks!

In each adventure, harness the magic of mathematics to retrieve the Elements of Harmony and bring Equestria back into balance. Play four learning mini games that reinforce math skills like probability, measurement and more. Take to air, using skills and just the right timing to earn and collect stars – and new pony flight powers. Use problem-solving skills and knowledge of operations to identify the animated equations that solve word problems in this amazing math game for kids!

LeapFrog creates award-winning educational solutions that delight, engage and inspire children to reach their potential. We know that children learn best when they’re having fun, and that every child learns differently. With solutions that are personalized to each child’s level, every day brings pure learning fun. Visit us at http://www.leapfrog.com/

See more learning tips and videos on our channel: http://www.youtube.com/user/LeapFrogOfficialSite

Follow LeapFrog on Social
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/LeapFrog
Twitter: http://www.facebook.com/LeapFrog
Pinterest: http://http://www.pinterest.com/LeapFrogInc/
Instagram: http://instagram.com/LeapFrogOfficial
